fact.description: The match is underway in Belo Horizonte.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colombia's half?
Greece needs to be cautious. Colombia have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Greece is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Greece at Mineirao Stadium.
Greece's Giannis Maniatis is on target but unsuccessful.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Giannis Maniatis of Greece smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
That's a fine assist from Juan Cuadrado.
Panagiotis Kone for Greece gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Colombia at Mineirao Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Colombia goal kick.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Colombia.
Colombia have a dangerous throw-in.
Colombia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been resumed.
Free kick Greece.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured James Rodriguez.
Greece's Jose Holebas gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Colombia defender.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Colombia in their own half.
Colombia's James Rodriguez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in Colombia.
Throw-in for Colombia in their own half.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Colombia in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a throw-in for Colombia, close to Greece's area.
Throw-in for Colombia close to the penalty box.
Mark Geiger blows against Colombia's Teofilo Gutierrez for offside.
Can Colombia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Greece's half?
James Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Colombia.
Mark Geiger signals a Greece throw-in in Colombia's half.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Colombia have a goal kick.
Greece to take a throw-in in Colombia territory.
Mark Geiger awards Colombia a goal kick.
Free kick Greece.
Carlos Sanchez (Colombia) gets a yellow card.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Greece.
Vasilis Torosidis (Greece) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Colombia at Mineirao Stadium.
Ball safe as Colombia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Greece at Mineirao Stadium.
Greece are coming forward and Jose Holebas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Colombia have a goal kick.
Teofilo Gutierrez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Play has been resumed at Mineirao Stadium.
Can Greece capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Colombia's half?
Teofilo Gutierrez is back on the pitch.
Greece push forward through Georgios Samaras, whose finish on goal is saved.
Colombia's Juan Cuadrado breaks free at Mineirao Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
The match in Belo Horizonte is underway once more.
Colombia's Teofilo Gutierrez is back in action after a slight knock.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Teofilo Gutierrez for Colombia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Greece to take a throw-in in Colombia territory.
Colombia have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
In Belo Horizonte Colombia attack through James Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
Mark Geiger awards Greece a goal kick.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colombia's half?
Corner awarded to Greece.
Mark Geiger signals a Greece throw-in in Colombia's half.
In Belo Horizonte Greece's Georgios Samaras is caught offside.
Throw-in for Colombia close to the penalty box.
Colombia have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
James Rodriguez (Colombia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Mark Geiger awards Greece a goal kick.
Greece's Dimitris Salpingidis is whistled for offside at Mineirao Stadium.
Throw-in Greece.
Panagiotis Kone for Greece drives towards goal at Mineirao Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Colombia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Colombia in their own half.
Mark Geiger will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the first half.
Throw-in for Greece in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Colombia have a goal kick.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Colombia.
Greece drive forward and Dimitris Salpingidis gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Colombia push forward through James Rodriguez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal kick for Greece at Mineirao Stadium.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colombia's half?
Free kick Greece.
Mark Geiger signals a Colombia throw-in in Greece's half.
Free kick Colombia.
Sokratis (Greece) has received a first yellow card.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Greece.
Ball goes out of play for a Colombia goal kick.
Colombia push forward at Mineirao Stadium and James Rodriguez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Greece defence.
Colombia's Juan Cuadrado gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Colombia.
Dimitris Salpingidis (Greece) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Colombia's Victor Ibarbo gets in a shot on goal at Mineirao Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Colombia are in shooting range from this free kick.
Giannis Fetfatzidis is replacing Dimitris Salpingidis for Greece at Mineirao Stadium.
Corner awarded to Colombia.
Abel Aguilar instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Greece.
Free kick Greece.
Goal kick for Colombia at Mineirao Stadium.
Free kick Greece.
Ball safe as Colombia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Greece to take a throw-in in Colombia territory.
Mark Geiger signals a throw-in for Greece, close to Colombia's area.
Colombia have a dangerous throw-in.
Fanis Gekas (Greece) shoots and rattles the crossbar!
Mark Geiger signals a Colombia throw-in in Greece's half.
Kostas Mitroglou is on a sub for Fanis Gekas for Greece.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Greece.
Corner awarded to Colombia.
Greece needs to be cautious. Colombia have an attacking throw-in.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Jose Nestor Pekerman is making the team's first substitution at Mineirao Stadium with Alexander Mejia replacing Abel Aguilar.
Kostas Mitroglou for Greece is whistled offside.
Important block from the Colombia defence as Kostas Mitroglou fires in a strike for Greece.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Mark Geiger.
Free kick Colombia.
Throw-in for Colombia at Mineirao Stadium.
Colombia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jose Nestor Pekerman (Colombia) is making a second substitution, with Santiago Arias replacing Pablo Armero.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte, Giannis Maniatis of Greece is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Greece have a goal kick.
Jose Nestor Pekerman (Colombia) is making a third substitution, with Jackson Martinez replacing Teofilo Gutierrez.
Throw-in for Greece close to the penalty box.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Greece.
In Belo Horizonte Colombia drive forward through Santiago Arias. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Colombia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Santos is making the team's third substitution at Mineirao Stadium with Georgios Karagounis replacing Panagiotis Kone.
Free kick Greece.
Colombia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colombia's half?
Colombia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Greece.
Mark Geiger awards Colombia a goal kick.
Greece's Georgios Samaras breaks free at Mineirao Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Colombia at Mineirao Stadium.
Mark Geiger signals a free kick to Colombia.
Colombia to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Greece to take a throw-in in Colombia territory.
Mark Geiger awards Greece a goal kick.
Can Colombia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Greece's half?
At Mineirao Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the second half.
Throw-in Colombia.
Mark Geiger signals a Greece throw-in in Colombia's half.
Colombia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Colombia.
Juan Cuadrado with an assist there.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-0.
